rows.label: bf02210100_0010
rows.name: You live down here?

rows.label: bf02210100_0020
rows.name:
This just back door. Front
entrance over there.

rows.label: bf02210100_0030
rows.name: Makes sense...

rows.label: bf02210100_0040
rows.name:
Whoa! Is that the Cloud Sea
down there? We're so high up!

rows.label: bf02210100_0050
rows.name:
Nice view, eh? Tora likes to just
sit and watch Cloud Sea sometimes.

rows.label: bf02210100_0060
rows.name: You have a wonderful home.

rows.label: bf02210100_0070
rows.name: Mo-mo. Anyway, um... Boss...

rows.label: bf02210100_0080
rows.name: B-Boss?

rows.label: bf02210100_0090
rows.name: Tora explain other reason I help you.

rows.label: bf02210100_0100
rows.name:
You see...Tora always wanted
to make Driver friends.

rows.label: bf02210100_0110
rows.name: Huh! Interested in Drivers, are you?

rows.label: bf02210100_0120
rows.name: But of course!

rows.label: bf02210100_0130
rows.name:
Tora think it amazing how Driver and Blade
join spirits together to make big power!

rows.label: bf02210100_0140
rows.name: Tora really want to be Boss's sidekick.

rows.label: bf02210100_0150
rows.name:
Hey Tora, can't you do something about
calling me 'Boss' all the time?

rows.label: bf02210100_0160
rows.name: Why not?

rows.label: bf02210100_0170
rows.name:
Well, it's just that, I'm
still a novice Driver. So...

rows.label: bf02210100_0180
rows.name:
Novice or not don't matter.
Driver is still Driver.

rows.label: bf02210100_0190
rows.name: You should be more boastful.

rows.label: bf02210100_0200
rows.name: Yeah, I'm not gonna do that...

rows.label: bf02210100_0210
rows.name:
All right. You can call me
that if it makes you happy.

rows.label: bf02210100_0220
rows.name:
But instead of all this sidekick
stuff, can't we just be friends?

rows.label: bf02210100_0230
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: bf02210100_0240
rows.name: Tora will be friend of Boss?! Hooray!

rows.label: bf02210100_0250
rows.name: What a weird little guy.

rows.label: bf02210100_0260
rows.name:
Hey, Tora! Do you know
much about this town?

rows.label: bf02210100_0270
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: bf02210100_0280
rows.name:
You wouldn't happen to know where the
army takes prisoners, would you?

rows.label: bf02210100_0290
rows.name: Rex... did you mean Nia and the others?

rows.label: bf02210100_0300
rows.name: We have to save Nia and Byakko.

rows.label: bf02210100_0310
rows.name: I thought you'd say that.

rows.label: bf02210100_0320
rows.name:
Oh! You talk about Driver and Blade who were
with Boss before Tora's daring rescue?

rows.label: bf02210100_0330
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: bf02210100_0340
rows.name:
Mo mo... Tora would have to ask
around town for info like that.

rows.label: bf02210100_0350
rows.name: Before we do anything, time for food!

rows.label: bf02210100_0360
rows.name:
All of today's running around make
Tora hungry. Need food to help boss!

rows.label: bf02210100_0370
rows.name: I'm a little peckish too.

rows.label: bf02210100_0380
rows.name:
Can't we eat later? I want to find
Nia and Byakko as soon as possible!

rows.label: bf02210100_0390
rows.name: See? Your stomach is growling too, Boss!

rows.label: bf02210100_0400
rows.name: I... I can't help it, can I?!

rows.label: bf02210100_0410
rows.name:
Um, if it's all right with
everyone, I could cook something?

rows.label: bf02210100_0420
rows.name: Homura? I didn't know you could cook!

rows.label: bf02210100_0430
rows.name:
Hehe, well as long as fire is involved, I can do
almost anything! Fry, steam, grill - you name it.

rows.label: bf02210100_0440
rows.name: Whoa!

rows.label: bf02210100_0450
rows.name:
If you want shaved ice, though... You
might have to find someone else.

rows.label: bf02210100_0460
rows.name: Well, you can't have everything.
